## 数据介绍和处理

### 数据导入
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
options(scipen=8)
library(data.table)
library(anytime)
library(kableExtra)


dt <- fread("~/Desktop/NeuerArbeit/CDNOW_master.txt")
setnames(dt,c("id","date","numberOfBuying","account"))
dt <-  dt[,date := anydate(date)]

kable(dt[sample(.N,6)])

```

### 各变量情况

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(DescTools)
library(ggplot2)
plot(Desc(dt$date)[[1]][["freq"]][,1:2])

```
